name: DROID™ 2 by Motorola
description:
With its 1 GHz processor and Android 2.2 with Adobe Flash 10, the DROID 2 offers PC-like power and speed. Use the intuitive QWERTY keyboard to touch, talk, press or Swype your texts. Create a WiFi hotspot with up to five connections. Work or play? You choose!

additionalFeatures: DLNA, Adobe® Flash® Player 10.1, Accessibility features: Tactile QWERTY keyboard, arrow keys, voice search button, camera button, Zoom Mode screen magnifier, Voice Readouts Screen Reader
